title: 5v5 Ranked Team Expands
body:
Hello there guys,
iam in work to create a serious team,
Requirements and what we can offer:

-The team got a Daily Playtime Shedule so pls be rly active.
-Playtime is from 20oCLock CET for atleast 2 Games.
-Be able to hold our shedule atleast 4 times a week.
-Iam looking for everyrole except supp.
-We will use Skype/TS for communication.
-be atleast 18years old
-Wish to be part of something more then just a grp of people who just play the same Game
-Play atleast 3hours aDay
-Dont be in BronzeElo
-Pls rly main the role u apply for
-I will play some Normals with u to see how u behave in different situatuions and get used to your championpool.
-Huge Tryouts Today

Sitenote: 
We are allready a complete team but looking for more people to secure our Daily Playtime and getting some Competition in.



if ur interrested pls apply here and/or addme ingame for chat.

Strawhatya :)

replies.body:
Hey there,

Im looking for an active LoL-Team, which plays at least 2 games each evening from 20:00 up to the ending of the second game. I'm main Ad-Carry but I dont play "the" meta-champs often. 
I main Twitch, Jinx, Vayne and Miss Fortudine (mostly Twitch), but I am personally quite defensive in the early game, what doesn't mean that I don't tryhard sometimes with Jinx or Vayne ;-)

Finally I can say, that I am older than 18, but it's personally better for me to use Teamspeak instead of Skype! 
I will add you to my friendlist, see you soon, have a nice day!
